001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Facade;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.BasisFunction;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer.LinearModelOptimizer;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
008
009import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
010import java.util.Map;
011
012@Facade
013public class LinearRegression<N extends Number> {
014
015    protected final BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator;
016    private final DataSet<N> trainSet;
017    private final Map<String, DataSet<N>> testSets;
018    private final LinearModelOptimizer<N> optimizer;
019
020    public LinearRegression(BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator, DataSet<N> trainSet, Map<String, DataSet<N>> testSets, LinearModelOptimizer<N> optimizer) {
021        this.basisFunctionGenerator = basisFunctionGenerator;
022        this.trainSet = trainSet;
023        this.testSets = testSets;
024        this.optimizer = optimizer;
025    }
026
027    public DataSet<N> getTrainSet() {
028        return trainSet;
029    }
030
031    public Map<String, DataSet<N>> getTestSets() {
032        return testSets;
033    }
034
035    public LinearModelOptimizer<N> getOptimizer() {
036        return optimizer;
037    }
038
039    public LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> fitComplexity(int m) {
040        LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> regression = LinearBasisFunctionModel.create(m, basisFunctionGenerator);
041        optimizer.setOptimalWeights(regression, trainSet);
042        return regression;
043    }
044
045    public Pair<Float, Map<String, Float>> calculateRMEs(LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> model) {
046        float trainRme = calculateRME(trainSet, model);
047        Map<String, Float> testRmes = new LinkedHashMap<>();
048        for (Map.Entry<String, DataSet<N>> testSetEntry : testSets.entrySet()) {
049            testRmes.put(testSetEntry.getKey(), calculateRME(testSetEntry.getValue(), model));
050        }
051        return Pair.of(trainRme, testRmes);
052    }
053
054    public float calculateRME(DataSet<N> dataSet, LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> regression) {
055        float mse = 0.0f;
056        for (DataSet.Sample<N> sample : dataSet) {
057            float estimated = regression.estimateScalar(sample.features()).floatValue();
058            float target = sample.targetOutputs()[0].floatValue();
059            mse += (float) Math.pow(estimated - target, 2) / dataSet.size();
060        }
061        return (float) Math.sqrt(mse);
062    }
063}
